hero.title: Hello, welcome!
hero.description: I am Andrei and i've been a Software Developer for more than {{ yearsOfExperience }} years, mainly in the web area. Wanna know how i can help you out? Let's have a coffee and talk! Contact me for more details.

services.title: Offered services
services.subtitle: I offer backend + frontend services, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur quis sapien mauris. Nulla rutrum enim pharetra ultrices aliquam.
services.modern_technologies: Building apps with modern technologies, like:

social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.subtitle: You can also find me on social media
social_media.linkedin_description: Personal contact page, containing a short description of my professional career.
social_media.github_description: Github personal page, containing projects and ocasional ideas, open-source.

hero.title: About me
hero.description: I am Andrei, I'm {{ age }} years old and i've been a software developer for over {{ yearsOfExperience }} years. In my free time i play the guitar and video games.

software_developer.title: Software Developer
software_developer.description: I have been working as a software developer since August 2020. During this time I've developed my skills in programming and managing a clean team and infrastructure. I gained a rich experience in the Front-End area, using Javascript frameworks such as Vue or React, but also in the Back-End area, where I gained knowledge with the help of NodeJS and Express.

team_leader.title: Team Leader
team_leader.description: During my career I also held the position of Team Leader for the Web team in one of the jobs I was hired at. In this position I managed a team of 4 people on several projects simultaneously, written in different frameworks or languages, bringing them all to the finish line. At the same time, I kept a close connection with the company's clients, arranging periodic meetings to update the status of the projects or for new information regarding implementation.

personal_projects.title: Personal projects

fmkey.title: FMKey
fmkey.description: A 3D virtual shop in WebGL, written in C# through Unity.

next_three_globe.title: Next Three Globe
next_three_globe.description: Project written in NextJS that renders a 3D globe in ThreeJS which can be rotated and zoomed to see different partners worldwide.

bmaskates.title: BMASkates
bmaskates.description: Full Stack application with vanilla Javascript on Front-End and NodeJS + Express in Back-End. The server works both on the views method and on the REST API.

personal_projects.github_page: For more information, visit the <1>Github page</1>.

development.title: Web/Mobile/Game Application Development
development.description: Creation of one or more applications, from prototyping and discussions to maintenance.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: 1:1 meetings to understand and provide you with the best service based on your needs.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Maintenance of the application, after its completion, for a set period of time.

bugfixing.title: Troubleshooting / Help with existing projects
bugfixing.description: Solving problems arising from other developments or implementing new functionality.

ecommerce_start.title: Getting started in E-Commerce
ecommerce_start.description: Installing and learning a CMS (Content Management System), such as Wordpress, to start an online store and sell products.

contact.title: Did i make you curious?
contact.subtitle: Let's talk over coffee about your next successful idea.
contact.write_through_contact_form: Write me through the contact form
contact.view_my_cv_here: In the meantime, you can view my CV <1>here</1>.

hero.subtitle: I'm glad you made it this far. I am very curious about all your plans and wish we could talk more about them. Wanna get in touch?
